task.title: Real-Time Reports Configuration
task.shortdesc: Steps for setting up real-time reports in marketing reports & analytics.

taskbody.context: Setting up real-time reports within Reports & Analytics consists of selecting the report suite and configuring up to 3 reports for it.

step.cmd: Select the report suite for which you want to enable real-time reports. Navigate to Reports & AnalyticsView All Reports > Site MetricsReal-Time and select the report suite from the drop-down at the top:
step.stepresult: If you try to view real-time reports for a report suite that has not been set up, a message appears with a link that takes you to the setup page in Step 2:

step.cmd: To set up your reports, click the gear icon (top right) to access the Report Suite Manager. (Also available under AnalyticsAdmin > Report SuitesEdit SettingsReal-Time.)
Enable real-time reports for this report suite.
Set up real-time data collection for up to three reports, with one metric and three dimensions or classifications per report.

stepresult.note: For a single Real-Time report, we do not currently support enabling duplicate dimensions, even if a different classification is selected for each dimension.
stepresult.p: For more information about classifications, see .
stepresult.note: Some dimensions, such as "Search Keyword" or "Product", do not persist in Real-Time like they do elsewhere in Adobe Analytics. When you select a non-persistent metric, this warning appears:

step.cmd: Click Save or Save and View Report. After this initial report setup, it can take up to 20 minutes for the data to begin streaming. From then on, data is immediately available. For information on viewing Real-Time reports, see Run a Real-Time Report.
By default, all users have access to Real-Time reports. To remove access, manage access to metrics and reports and remove access to Advanced Reporting > Real-Time.
